name: Light Leap
description:
This is my first project, which is based on Doodle Jump. This mostly served as a way for me to learn how to use Godot and a lot of its basic tools. Mostly learned how to use Light, Imported Plugins (The line animation for player movement is an imported plugin), Sounds, Scene Transfer, and a lot more.

Sounds are either made by https://www.beepbox.co or freesound.org. All art is made by me (There isn't a lot of it.) 

Patch 1.1 

-Hotkeys for Jetpack (W for Jetpack) and Platform (Spacebar for Platform)

-Larger coins

-Your character falls on the Game Over screen when you lose

-Coins actually spawn on the left side of the screen now

-Settings page for adjusting volume and full screen if desired.

Patch 1.0

-It's released.
